sectionGroupList.title: Personal Site
sectionGroupList.body: This personal portfolio site was a experiment/project itself; it was my first time using a 'headless' CMS and while it started as a side project, it expanded into a extendable website I can use for the foreseeable future (without having to edit the code directly!). TLDR it makes a static site into a dynamic site and for a personal website it proves to be a great use case. I can update my side projects, add new pages, update the color scheme, and more without having to really edit any code.
